articles.description:
RT Hashnode
NFT on optimism ⛓
Tutorial: 💻
▫ Create & deploy an ERC-721 smart contract
▫ Mint the token on Optimism Kovan-Testnet using Solidity, Hardhat & Pinata
By the end of this guide, you'll be able to mint an NFT & display it on Quixotic.
By @kayprasla. https://ankr.hashnode.dev/deploy-and-mint-a-cryptokitties-like-nft-with-erc-721-smart-contract?source=tw0722

articles.description:
RT stani.lens (🌿,👻)
Lenstube is here 🥳🌿🌿 All content stored on @ArweaveTeam and exciting features by @LensProtocol such as pay to subscribe, collect videos and mirror your favourite content to your audience, powered also by @Livepeer 🤩 Goat 🐐effort from the devs on Lensverse 🌿
Lenstube (🎥 ,🌿): gm frens 📢
Lenstube, an open-source web3 video-sharing 🎥 social media platform built on top of @LensProtocol 🌿 is now live on @0xPolygon mainnet 🎉
Try now 
Zero gas fees ⛽️ thanks to lens relayers.
 https://lenstube.xyz
